POPUP.TEXT:
Processing the video and adapting it to you means embedding information and images that are considered personal information. By clicking the 'I confirm' button you confirm that the information is uploaded of your own free will.
At Shamir, we will not use this information and we will make sure to delete it from the server that generates the video in accordance with the agreement signed with the service provider.
Shamir will not keep a copy of the video or the information uploaded to the app.
